alert.note: Alert for Natrona County Lower Elevations; Southeast Johnson County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 05 at 2:03PM MST until January 05 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow and dangerously cold wind chills expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. Wind chills between 20 and 30 below zero. * WHERE...Southeast Johnson County and Natrona County Lower Elevations. * WHEN...Until 5 PM this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 35 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Call 5 1 1, to get the latest road conditions.

area.areaDesc: Natrona County Lower Elevations; Southeast Johnson County
